item.title: [OAK-478] NPE in the TypeValidator when using the Lucene Index
item.summary: NPE in the TypeValidator when using the Lucene Index

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
attaching patch that will enable the NPE.

As mentioned by Jukka on the mailing list [0], I dug a bit into the code and found out that the ValidatingHook doesn't in fact ignore hidden nodes.

Attaching patch that adds the missing bits.
Also, this makes the NPE go away.

Thoughts?

[0] http://markmail.org/thread/ov7z7bccmdp23ygb

fixed with rev 1414752.

I refactored the ValidatingHook to also ignore hidden nodes in the event of new nodes and deleted nodes, I missed that in the attached patch.
